languages.text: {n}Все блюстители как один опускаются на колени.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, это происшествие бросило тень на нашу честь. Мы просим одного — шанса искупить вину. Позвольте мне немедленно отправиться на офицерскую палубу и лично возглавить расследование".

{n}As one, every enforcer present gets on their knees.{/n} "Lord Captain, this incident has cast a shadow on our honour. We only ask for one thing: a chance to absolve ourselves of our guilt. Allow me to head to the officers' deck at once so that I may lead the investigation personally."
languages.original_text: {n}Все блюстители как один опускаются на колени.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, это происшествие бросило тень на нашу честь. Мы просим одного — шанса искупить вину. Позвольте мне немедленно отправиться на офицерскую палубу и лично возглавить расследование".

traits.locale_text: {n}As one, every enforcer present gets on their knees.{/n} "Lord Captain, this incident has cast a shadow on our honour. We only ask for one thing: a chance to absolve ourselves of our guilt. Allow me to head to the officers' deck at once so that I may lead the investigation personally."

{n}As one, every enforcer present gets on their knees.{/n} "Lord Captain, this incident has cast a shadow on our honour. We only ask for one thing: a chance to absolve ourselves of our guilt. Allow me to head to the officers' deck at once so that I may lead the investigation personally."

languages.text: {n}Todos los guardias presentes se arrodillan al unísono.{/n} «Lord Capitán, este incidente ha mancillado nuestro honor. Solo le pedimos la oportunidad de absolvernos de nuestra culpa. Permítame dirigirme a la cubierta de oficiales de inmediato para liderar la investigación en persona».
languages.original_text: {n}As one, every enforcer present gets on their knees.{/n} "Lord Captain, this incident has cast a shadow on our honour. We only ask for one thing: a chance to absolve ourselves of our guilt. Allow me to head to the officers' deck at once so that I may lead the investigation personally."

traits.locale_text: {n}Todos los guardias presentes se arrodillan al unísono.{/n} «Lord Capitán, este incidente ha mancillado nuestro honor. Solo le pedimos la oportunidad de absolvernos de nuestra culpa. Permítame dirigirme a la cubierta de oficiales de inmediato para liderar la investigación en persona».

languages.text: {n}その場にいるすべてのエンフォーサーが一斉に膝をつく。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、この事件は我々の名誉に影を落としました。私たちが求めているのは、たったひとつ。罪の意識を払拭する機会なのです。 今すぐ士官デッキに向かい、自ら調査を指揮することをお許しください」
languages.original_text: {n}As one, every enforcer present gets on their knees.{/n} "Lord Captain, this incident has cast a shadow on our honour. We only ask for one thing: a chance to absolve ourselves of our guilt. Allow me to head to the officers' deck at once so that I may lead the investigation personally."

traits.locale_text: {n}その場にいるすべてのエンフォーサーが一斉に膝をつく。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、この事件は我々の名誉に影を落としました。私たちが求めているのは、たったひとつ。罪の意識を払拭する機会なのです。 今すぐ士官デッキに向かい、自ら調査を指揮することをお許しください」

languages.text: {n}在场的所有执法者都整齐划一地跪了下来。{/n}“舰长大人，这样的事故为我们的荣耀蒙上了阴影。我只请求您一件事情——给我们个赎罪的机会。请允许我立刻前往军官甲板，亲自领导调查工作。”
languages.original_text: {n}As one, every enforcer present gets on their knees.{/n} "Lord Captain, this incident has cast a shadow on our honour. We only ask for one thing: a chance to absolve ourselves of our guilt. Allow me to head to the officers' deck at once so that I may lead the investigation personally."

traits.locale_text: {n}在场的所有执法者都整齐划一地跪了下来。{/n}“舰长大人，这样的事故为我们的荣耀蒙上了阴影。我只请求您一件事情——给我们个赎罪的机会。请允许我立刻前往军官甲板，亲自领导调查工作。”

languages.text: {n}Alle anwesenden Enforcers gehen wie ein Mann auf die Knie.{/n} "Lord Captain, dieser Vorfall hat einen Schatten auf unsere Ehre geworfen. Wir bitten nur um eines: eine Chance, uns von unserer Schuld reinzuwaschen. Erlaubt mir, sofort aufs Offiziersdeck zu gehen, um die Untersuchung persönlich zu leiten."
languages.original_text: {n}As one, every enforcer present gets on their knees.{/n} "Lord Captain, this incident has cast a shadow on our honour. We only ask for one thing: a chance to absolve ourselves of our guilt. Allow me to head to the officers' deck at once so that I may lead the investigation personally."

traits.locale_text: {n}Alle anwesenden Enforcers gehen wie ein Mann auf die Knie.{/n} "Lord Captain, dieser Vorfall hat einen Schatten auf unsere Ehre geworfen. Wir bitten nur um eines: eine Chance, uns von unserer Schuld reinzuwaschen. Erlaubt mir, sofort aufs Offiziersdeck zu gehen, um die Untersuchung persönlich zu leiten."

languages.text: {n}Tous les prévôts s'agenouillent comme un seul homme.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, cet incident a jeté le déshonneur sur notre ordre. Nous n'avons qu'une chose à vous demander : donnez-nous une chance de nous absoudre. Permettez-moi de me rendre sur le pont des officiers pour diriger moi-même l'enquête. »
languages.original_text: {n}As one, every enforcer present gets on their knees.{/n} "Lord Captain, this incident has cast a shadow on our honour. We only ask for one thing: a chance to absolve ourselves of our guilt. Allow me to head to the officers' deck at once so that I may lead the investigation personally."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tous les prévôts s'agenouillent comme un seul homme.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, cet incident a jeté le déshonneur sur notre ordre. Nous n'avons qu'une chose à vous demander : donnez-nous une chance de nous absoudre. Permettez-moi de me rendre sur le pont des officiers pour diriger moi-même l'enquête. »

languages.text: {n}Ortamda bulunan tüm infazcılar, senkronize bir şekilde dizlerinin üstüne çöküyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, bu olay onurumuza leke sürdü. Sizden tek bir ricamız var: Bu suçumuzu telafi etme şansı vermeniz. İzninizle hemen subay güvertesine gidip soruşturmayı bizzat yöneteyim."
languages.original_text: {n}As one, every enforcer present gets on their knees.{/n} "Lord Captain, this incident has cast a shadow on our honour. We only ask for one thing: a chance to absolve ourselves of our guilt. Allow me to head to the officers' deck at once so that I may lead the investigation personally."
